Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $12,000 to you. Considering this, I would like to offer you the opportunity to own it for $10,000. I believe this price reflects the value you will receive and the exclusivity of the product. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
